name: Facemaker
description: Just like Spinnaker's FaceMaker, A.S.K.'s Facemaker is about making faces. You start out by entering the person's name and sex, and from there on, you are asked questions about face, eyes, facial hair, complexion and so on. Jewellery and hats are also options. Once a face has been completed, you may change it or draw another one.
alsoFor: BBC Micro, Dragon 32/64, VIC-20 | Combined View
